review: Need ezcast for ios users to stream from the browser
author: Ali Budiman Susanto

review: SUPERB!! Picture quality is awesome. WiFi streaming is good.If could have come with USB cable it would have been more better.
author: JanSport Bag

review: I submit to the great and all powerful Google!
author: Welldon Fargo

review: Works great, just like our Chromecast on our other TV.  Liked getting 2-month free trial of Hulu Plus
author: Keith Arthur Edwards

review: Does what it promises to do. worth the price.
author: Beau Izad

review: So easy to set up, amazing picture quality, a lot of smart touches like the ability to set the background to your Google+ picture collection. If only the content providers also decided to move to the 21st century and offered similar quality... no Spotify really? Any more boring ads Hulu Plus? Come on!
author: riccume

review: We are really enjoying Netflix on our tv through Chromecast. The picture is good and clear with great clarity. It was very easy to set up too!  Our son is thrilled that he doesn't have to share his XBox with us just so we can watxh a movie or some other feature. We recomend this device.
author: chris
